title: Charlie Bingham Gets Clocked
description: Wayside Schools meets P.G. Wodehouse in this hilarious chapter book.  Featherbrained, lovable Charlie Bingham just wants a peaceful day at school with Miss Walker, the teacher he loves. But when his best pal Brad accidentally steals Miss Walker's prize possession, an antique alarm clock, things get messy. Pretty soon, Charlie, Brad, and their friend Alyssa are racing to return the clock without being caught in a madcap adventure that's full of laughs.
author: Maggie M. Larche
